successes.title: Circuit Scribe: Draw Circuits Instantly
successes.description: Circuit Scribe is a rollerball pen that writes with conductive silver ink.  It makes creating circuits as easy as doodling.

Pledges.description:
Thanks for backing Circuit Scribe!  
STEM EDUCATION WORKBOOK:
Digital download of our collaborative STEM education Circuit Scribe workbook.

CIRCUIT SCRIBE:
Conductive Rollerball Pen with free Electroninks LED component (+$10 for Canada)
EARLY BIRD BASIC KIT: Circuit Scribe with Basic Components (+$10 for Canada)
BASIC KIT: Circuit Scribe with Basic Components (+$10 for Canada)
EARLY BIRD BASIC KIT + BOOK: Circuit Scribe with Basic Components & Choice of Maker Notebook or Educational Workbook (+$10 for Canada)
BASIC KIT + BOOK: Circuit Scribe with Basic Components & Choice of Maker Notebook or Educational  Workbook (+$10 for Canada)
EARLY BIRD MAKER KIT: Circuit Scribe, Basic Components, Maker Components & Maker Notebook (+$10 for Canada)
MAKER KIT: Circuit Scribe, Basic Components, Maker Components & Maker Notebook (+$10 for Canada)
GIFT PACK: 5 Circuit Scribe Pens (+$10 for Canada)

DEVELOPER KIT:
Circuit Scribe, 2 sets Basic Components, 2 sets Maker Components & Developer Components (+$10 for Canada)

CIRCUIT SCRIBE BUNDLE:
10 Circuit Scribes (+$10 for Canada)
EARLY BIRD CLASSROOM KIT: 10 Basic Kits (includes 10 Circuit Scribes) & Educational Workbook (+$10 for Canada)

CLASSROOM KIT:
10 Basic Kits (includes 10 Circuit Scribes) & Educational Workbook (+$10 for Canada)
COMPONENT DESIGNER:  Don't see a component you really want?  We'll get your custom component designed and manufactured. (Basic Kit Included) *Limitations Apply (+$10 for Canada)
ELECTRONINKS SHOW & TELL: Electroninks will fly to your classroom or makerspace and do a full 1 day demo.  This will include plenty of Circuit Scribes and Components.
